title: Mid lane is 0-3-0. Enemy 4-man ganks bottom, mid cannot follow, we lose the game.
body:
Fix this bullshit, this is not okay.

Literally the entire game lost, solely because our mid was behind and couldn't stop the 4-man on bottom lane.

replies.body: What needs to be fixed exactly? Do you want Riot to make sure every mid lane player put on your team can't lose lane? Do you want them to prevent people from ganking bot? Do you want Riot to force your champion to move towards a lane if there are several enemies there? Please explain better what the fuck you want changed.

Do you want Riot to force your champion to move towards a lane if there are several enemies there? Please explain better what the fuck you want changed.

The fact that the first team to successfully 4/5-man gank bottom lane wins 9/10 games, which every play who has any clue about the game is already aware of.

So how do you fix that? They could super buff the bot lane tower so a 4 man gank bot doesn't lead to an early first tower death, but ganking bot will still be a viable option because it will put your bot lane ahead and allow them to snowball.  Or Riot puts a big magical invisible wall that prevents anyone other than the adc and support from entering the lane, do you want that?
